meanings.definition: Capable of being revised or amended.
meanings.sent1: The essay was revisable, so I could make changes to improve it.
meanings.sent2: It is important to have revisable documents in case updates are needed.
meanings.sent3: The revisable recipe turned out to be a hit after I added more spices.
meanings.sent4: Her revisable decision to switch majors opened up new opportunities for her.
meanings.sent5: The revisable painting allowed the artist to experiment with different colors and styles.

meanings.sent1: The schedule is revisable, so it may be adjusted based on new information.
meanings.sent2: Our plans for the weekend are revisable depending on the weather forecast.
meanings.sent3: The revisable storyline in the movie kept the audience guessing until the end.
meanings.sent4: His revisable opinion on the matter showed his willingness to consider different viewpoints.
meanings.sent5: The revisable contract gave both parties the flexibility to make modifications if needed.
